about_the_game:
OVERVIEW

Dark & Evil is an Indie Open World Action RPG game where players take on the role of a young and inexperienced Dark Lord. Fresh from a humbling defeat at the hands of humanity, the protagonist is fueled by the burning desire to conquer the world and reclaim his rightful throne! Build your army of goblins, orcs and trolls and explore a fantasy world waiting to be dominated!

FIGHT!

Feel the thrill of battle in our fast-paced, deep and satisfying combat system. Unleash your skills while customizing your playstyle with a vast array of weapons, armor, and magic.

EXPLORE!

Traverse a vast, beautifully crafted fantasy world, from large meadows to ancient ruins. From frozen tundras to scorching deserts, this world is filled with mysteries waiting to be uncovered!

RECRUIT!

As a Dark Lord, recruit and lead an army of fearsome creatures like goblins, orcs, and trolls. Each unit brings unique strengths to your legion, allowing for diverse battle strategies.

MADE WITH UNREAL

Made by a very small team with the latest Unreal Engine 5 and the powerful Ascent Combat Framework! 

Music: Scott Buckley - Dark Fantasy Studio
